    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83614</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Forces agissant sur une étoile pendant les étapes de sa vie</string>
            <string language="en">Forces acting on a star during its life stages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erzwingt das Fungieren auf einem Stern während 
seiner Lebenstadien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força agir em uma estrela durante seus estágios
da vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza comportarsi su una stella durante le 
relative fasi di vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις που ενεργούν σε ένα αστέρι κατά τη διάρκεια
των σταδίων ζωής του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza actuar en una estrella durante sus etapas de
la vida</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Troisième sur trois illustrations montrant les forces  agissant sur une étoile pendant les étapes de sa vie. La  combinaison équilibrée des forces centripètes (gravitationnelles) et  des forces centrifuges (pression) se produisent pendant l'étape stable d'une étoile.</string>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations showing the forces acting on a star during its life stages. The balanced combination of inward forces (gravitational) and outward forces (pressure) occur during the stable stage of a star.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">équilibre</string>
            <string language="en">balance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">forces</string>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étapes de la vie</string>
            <string language="en">life stages</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pression</string>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">stabilité</string>
            <string language="en">stability</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoiles</string>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, welche die Kräfte 
fungieren auf einem Stern während seiner Lebenstadien zeigen. 
Die ausgeglichene Kombination der inneren Kräfte (Gravitations)
und der nachaußengerichteten Kräfte (Druck) treten während des 
beständigen Stadiums eines Sternes auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de três ilustrações que mostram as 
forças que agem em uma estrela durante seus estágios da vida. 
A combinação equilibrada das forças internas (gravitacionais)
e de forças externas (pressão) ocorre durante o estágio estável de
uma estrela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano le 
forze che si comportano su una stella durante le relative fasi di 
vita. La combinazione equilibrata delle forze interne 
(gravitazionali) e delle forze esterne (pressione) si presenta durante
la fase stabile di una stella.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τις δυνάμεις 
που ενεργούν σε ένα αστέρι κατά τη διάρκεια των σταδίων ζωής 
του. Ο ισορροπημένος συνδυασμός εσωτερικών δυνάμεων 
(βαρύτητας) και οι εξωτερικές δυνάμεις (πίεση) εμφανίζονται κατά
τη διάρκεια του σταθερού σταδίου ενός αστεριού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de tres ilustraciones que muestran las 
fuerzas que actúan en una estrella durante sus etapas de la vida. 
La combinación equilibrada de las fuerzas internas 
(gravitacionales) y de las fuerzas exteriores (presión) ocurre 
durante la etapa estable de una estrella.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
